I recommend you buy the portal bundle when it goes on sale (which it frequently does).

一个优秀的机制设计加上优秀的关卡设计，让游戏从教学到综合运用再到挑战的流程十分流畅，这对于这种益智、过关的游戏是非常重要的，《传送门》做到了极致。关卡设计上，IPMT的良好运用使游戏对玩家非常友好（intro  practice  master  twist），玩起来在主观感受上没有过难的关卡，没有卡关的情况，同时也使玩家动脑子找到过关的办法后能获得很好的成就感和满足感；而《传送门》最惊艳的还是在于它的机制设计，传送门在其他游戏里是作为地图或场景的切换为用的，而在这儿传送门成了核心玩法，你可以随意操控两个传送门以达到空间转移的目的，而且在传送时可以保留动量，这就意味着可以利用传送门在不同方位的合理放置而转化你的速度方向！这在游戏中也是反复运用的一个机制。本来这些就够了，毕竟总时长才大约4小时，而令我意外的是游戏在关卡推进的同时也讲述了一个离奇诡异的故事，让游戏本身有了合理的解释，你并不是老鼠，在被精心设计的盒子里过关，你可以探索寻找到设计盒子的人然后找到你之所以在这个盒子里的一切原因！综上，神作就是神作，神就神在传送门的机制设计了，可见神作不需要面面俱到细致丰富，玩法神了，游戏就神了。

Portal is a game that is almost impossible not to like. It's extremely charming with a bizarre, subtle sense of humor along with extremely innovative puzzles that won't stump you for too long, yet will force you to stop and think outside the box and get creative.

The price tag on sale is obscenely cheap, with Valve practically giving this thing away, and it's a nice low-time/money investment to see if you want to try out the sequel as well. The full game is extremely short (like, 5 hours, if that), which isn't even really a downside considering how fulfilling and memorable a game this one is. Think of it more of a proof of concept for the sequel. 

Absolutely recommended to anyone and everyone, there's a good reason why people reference this one so much and practically killed the "cake is a lie" line from referencing it so much.

Solve the puzzles and try to escape from this crazy lab.
Recommended for everyone that loves puzzle-games and doesn`t mind ten year old graphics.

I consider this to be the best game I've ever played, even though I've only played 97 minutes of it. I don't like puzzle platformers! But this game is still as near to flawless as I've ever seen a game get. The mechanics are exquisite, the story is compelling, the difficulty is just right and the games dark humor (I don't like dark humor) is perfect. Portal is the Pac-Man, or Tetris of it's genre. This is a timeless classic.
